text: Piero Gorgatto (7 January 1925 - before 2012)Mention of Piero Gorgatto's death was an Italian sailor who competed in the 1956 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:Year of death missing Category:Italian male sailors (sport) Category:Olympic sailors of Italy Category:Sailors at the 1956 Summer Olympics – Dragon
title: Piero Gorgatto
